title: Residual Off-Policy RL for Finetuning Behavior Cloning Policies
selection_reason: Novel approach to combining off-policy RL with behavior cloning for practical robot learning applications

title: VolSplat: Rethinking Feed-Forward 3D Gaussian Splatting with Voxel-Aligned Prediction

selection_reason: Novel combination of video diffusion and self-distillation for practical 3D scene reconstruction from limited data

title: SOE: Sample-Efficient Robot Policy Self-Improvement via On-Manifold Exploration
